name: Auto resizing banners
description:
Optimize your time designers. Standardize all of your company's graphics. Automate yourself with a super Figma template.


Social media ready sizes: Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Google Ads, Yandex.Direct, LinkedIn, YouTube, Pinterest, Twitch, Mailchimp, Website


• 60+ ready-made banner sizes

• 45 backgrounds

• 45 buttons

• 6 gradients

• 20 photo masks and google font pair

• 30 mockups

• And also, a video tutorial on how to create your own elements and sizes
